actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-1028.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D76-95) relating to the Department of Agriculture, Soil Conservation Service, which is proposed by the President in his message of January 23, 1976, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives of the proposed deferral D76-95, relating to the Department of Agriculture, Soil Conservation Service, as set forth in the message of January 23, 1976, which was transmitted to the Congress by the President pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D76-95) relating to the Department of Agriculture, Soil Conservation Service, which is proposed by the President in his message of January 23, 1976, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
